briefdescription.para: CFS Limit Checker (LC) application entry point.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Limit Checker application entry point and main process loop.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the CFS Limit Checker (LC) application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Limit Checker application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to initialize (or restore from CDS) LC data structures and get the application registered with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup cFE Events Services for use by the LC application

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup the cFE software bus for use by the LC application

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function creates the tables used by the LC application and establishes the initial table values based on the configuration setting that enables the use of Critical Data Store (CDS) and the availability of stored data to restore.

briefdescription.para: Create Watchpoint and Actionpoint Result Tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function creates the dump only result tables used by the LC application.

briefdescription.para: Create Watchpoint and Actionpoint Definition Tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function creates the loadable definition tables used by the LC application.

briefdescription.para: Create Result Table and Application Data CDS Areas.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function creates the loadable definition tables used by the LC application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function loads the definition tables from table files named in the LC platform configuration header file. The function also initializes the contents of the dump only results tables and initializes the global application data structure.
